node.title: Meghan Markle spent an hour with Ellen. These were the three big moments from interview
node.alt: Meghan Markle and Ellen Degeneres sitting in chairs on the set of Ellen's talk show
node.description: The Duchess of Sussex makes a surprise appearance on the Ellen show, talking about her life with Prince Harry in California, sharing a rare photo of son Archie and taking to the streets of Los Angeles for a hidden camera prank.
node.content:
["Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, has given her first television interview since her and Prince Harry's explosive talk with Oprah Winfrey earlier this year.", "In a surprise, hour-long interview with Ellen DeGeneres, Meghan shared anecdotes about their life in California, Halloween costumes and incognito dates with her husband Prince Harry.", "These were the biggest moments from their interview.", "
Duchess says she and prince are 'happy'
", "The interview on Ellen was never going to be as Earth-shattering as the one she did with Oprah earlier this year.\u00a0", "Viewed by millions worldwide, Meghan made allegations of racism within the ranks of the Royal family.\u00a0", "Eight months after her interview with Winfrey, the duchess cut a far more relaxed figure on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.", "\"We're just happy,\" she said about her life in Montecito, California, where the couple now live.\u00a0", "Countering reports that Prince Harry feels cut off from his family and friends since ditching Royal duties in 2020, Meghan said her husband of three years \"loves\"\u00a0California.", "", "
Meghan showed a rare photo of her son Archie feeding chickens at their California home.\u00a0(Supplied: NBC\u00a0)
", "She gave the audience a rare glimpse of the couple's first-born child, Archie.\u00a0", "Photos of their daughter Lilibet, born earlier this year, have never been made public.\u00a0", "
Meghan reveals\u00a0her kids' Halloween costumes\u00a0
", "Meghan revealed that the\u00a0couple spent this Halloween at home, although their children were not enthusiastic about dressing up.\u00a0", "\"Archie was a dinosaur for, maybe, five minutes,\" she joked.\u00a0", "Meghan revealed the couple's second child, daughter Lilibet, who was born in June, was dressed as a skunk \"like Flower from Bambi\".\u00a0", "She also shared an anecdote about the early days of her relationship with Prince Harry, when they were still dating in secret.\u00a0", "They\u00a0went, incognito, to a post-apocalypse-themed Halloween party, Meghan said, along with friends and Harry's cousin Princess Eugenie who was with\u00a0then boyfriend and now husband, Jack Brooksbank.", "\"The four of us snuck out in Halloween costumes to just have one fun night on the town before it was out in the world that we were a couple,\" she said.", "
Hidden-camera prank
", "Meghan also took part in a hidden-camera stunt, a prank Ellen has played with other celebrities on unsuspecting members of the public.", "Through an earpiece, Ellen directed Meghan to say and do everything she said in the skit before getting her to do a squat as a test.", "At Ellen's direction, Meghan spoke to some vendors on the Warner Bros\u00a0lot, telling one she has \"healing powers\" while looking at crystals on display.", "Then, at another vendor, Ellen ordered Megan to nibble on a chip \"like a chipmunk\" and tell the vendor her \"boo loves hot sauce\".", "DeGeneres ended up revealing the prank after a couple of minutes, asking Meghan to sing with the vendors until she showed up on a golf cart and confessed it was all a joke.", "", "
Prince Harry and his wife Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, withdrew as senior working members of the Royal family in 2020.(Reuters: Hannah McKay)
"]
